```{r, echo = FALSE}
# google scholar metadata
library(metathis)
if (knitr::is_html_output()) {
  meta() %>%
  meta_description(
    "Solutions submitted by readers for the textbook Handbook of Regression Modeling in People Analytics by Keith McNulty"
  ) %>% 
  meta_name("github-repo" = "keithmcnulty/peopleanalytics-regression-book") %>% 
  meta_viewport() %>% 
  meta_social(
    title = "Solutions to Handbook of Regression Modeling in People Analytics by Keith McNulty",
    url = "https://peopleanalytics-regression-book.org",
    image = "https://peopleanalytics-regression-book.org/cover/coverpage-og.png",
    image_alt = "The cover of the book Handbook of Regression Modeling in People Analytics",
    og_type = "book",
    og_author = c("Keith McNulty"),
    twitter_card_type = "summary",
    twitter_creator = "@dr_keithmcnulty"
  )
}
```

Solutions to exercises from [Handbook of Regression Modeling in People Analytics](https://peopleanalytics-regression-book.org) requested by readers will be progressively added here.

If you want to request a solution or submit a solution, please do so via [Github issues](https://github.com/keithmcnulty/peopleanalytics-regression-book/issues).

Solutions submitted to date:

* [Chapter 2, All Data Exercises](https://github.com/keithmcnulty/peopleanalytics-regression-book/files/7964735/Chapter.2.pdf) - submitted by [Jo Cao](https://www.linkedin.com/in/joanne-cao/)
* [Chapter 3, Discussion Exercise 3](c3_de3.html)
* [Chapter 3, Discussion Exercise 9](c3_de9.html)
* [Chapter 3, Data Exercises 1-8](https://github.com/keithmcnulty/peopleanalytics-regression-book/files/8018815/Chapter.3.1-8.pdf) - submitted by [Jo Cao](https://www.linkedin.com/in/joanne-cao/)
* [Chapter 3, Data Exercise 9](c3_e9.html)
* [Chapter 4, All Data Exercises](https://github.com/keithmcnulty/peopleanalytics-regression-book/files/8056540/Chapter.4.pdf) - submitted by [Jo Cao](https://www.linkedin.com/in/joanne-cao/)
